code: import React from'react';import{HeartIcon}from'@heroicons/react/solid';import formatDistanceToNow from'date-fns/formatDistanceToNow';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function BlogView(_ref){var blog=_ref.blog;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative bg-blue-200 p-5 m-10 border-y-4 border-x-4 border-blue-900 text-black items-center rounded-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-3xl text-black font-bold",children:blog.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-xl",children:["-By ",blog.author]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex space-x-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"h-8 w-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HeartIcon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"font-semibold",children:[blog.likes," likes"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"font-semibold",children:formatDistanceToNow(new Date(blog.createdAt),{addSuffix:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:blog.body}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"p-3 m-3 bg-blue-400 rounded-md cursor-pointer border border-black",children:"Read More"})]});}

import React from 'react' import { HeartIcon } from '@heroicons/react/solid' import formatDistanceToNow from 'date-fns/formatDistanceToNow' export default function BlogView({ blog }) { return (

{blog.title}

-By {blog.author}

{blog.likes} likes

{formatDistanceToNow(new Date(blog.createdAt), { addSuffix: true })}

{blog.body}

) }
